ygData.subject: Re: Eruds Tonic, Lost Book quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Try hunting the NPC Poachers (when I kill them I get a faction hit for the Erudite HighConsel and the Paladins + a few more)
ygData.messageBody:
Try hunting the NPC Poachers (when I kill them I get a faction hit for the
Erudite HighConsel and the Paladins + a few more)

Dark Sharp wrote:

> From: "Dark Sharp" <darksharp@...>
>
> I am trying to trigger these quests using every thing i can think of
> including what, where, who, how variations.
>
> I am an Erudite LVL11 wizard w/ a charisma of 70...perhaps my faction
> standing with the Paladins is not enough...they do regard me indifferently
> when I con them
>
> Any ideas how to raise my faction with them?
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What was YOUR favorite part?!
